pr_title: Check that part was successfully uploaded for large file uploads before retrying for 500 errors

timeline.bodyText: If we don't want to expose this method and it's only meant for internal package use only for chunked upload we should consider different modifier, maybe default or protected?
timeline.author: carycheng
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -404,6 +405,66 @@ public BoxAPIResponse send(ProgressListener listener) { throw new RuntimeException(); } + /** + * Sends a request to upload a file part and returns a BoxFileUploadSessionPart containing information + * about the upload part. This method is separate from send() because it has custom retry logic. + * + *

If the server returns an error code or if a network error occurs, then the request will be automatically + * retried. If the maximum number of retries is reached and an error still occurs, then a {@link BoxAPIException} + * will be thrown.

+ * + * @param session The BoxFileUploadSession uploading the part + * @param offset Offset of the part being uploaded + * @throws BoxAPIException if the server returns an error code or if a network error occurs. + * @return A {@link BoxFileUploadSessionPart} part that has been uploaded. + */ + public BoxFileUploadSessionPart sendForUploadPart(BoxFileUploadSession session, long offset) {

timeline.bodyText: What's the status code for this post to be returned?
timeline.author: carycheng
carycheng
carycheng

timeline.bodyText: This test needs to add the status codes for the stubbed api response
timeline.author: carycheng

timeline.message: added status codes to tests and refactored
